view.interfaces

Interface IManageArtworkExhibit

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ManageArtworkExhibit

    public interface IManageArtworkExhibit
    Interface for the ManageArtworkExhibit.
    Author:
    Elisa Casadio

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addData(boolean isDX, java.lang.Object... fields)
      Adds a new artwork to be displayed.
      void attachController(IControllerManageArtworkExhibit ctrl)
      Attaches the controller to the ManageArtworkExhibit.
      void clearData(int row)
      Deletes the selected artwork to the left table.

    • Method Detail

      • attachController

        void attachController(IControllerManageArtworkExhibit ctrl)
        Attaches the controller to the ManageArtworkExhibit.
        Parameters:
        ctrl - the controller.

      • addData

        void addData(boolean isDX,
             java.lang.Object... fields)
        Adds a new artwork to be displayed. Depending on the boolean value, the data is added to the right table or to the left table.
        Parameters:
        isDX - true if the row is to be added to the right table otherwise false.
        fields - the fields to add to the left or right table.

      • clearData

        void clearData(int row)
        Deletes the selected artwork to the left table.
        Parameters:
        row - the selected table's row.
